model.mobile

Class Spell

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Element
      • model.mobile.Motion
        • model.mobile.Spell

  • public class Spell
extends Motion

    The Class Spell is a spell that the player can use to kill his enemies.

    Since:
    jre1.8.0_131
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pierre Baudot pierre.baudot@viacesi.fr
